title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 5-3.2 - Definitions for purposes of the security training tax credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 5-3.2 - Definitions for purposes of the security training tax credit

State Regulations
(Tax Law, sections 26, 210-B(21))
(a) The term "full year" means 1,750
qualified hours worked during the calendar year. (b) The term "qualified hours" means hours
worked, directly or indirectly, as a qualified security officer for the
qualified building owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
5-3.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
